00110     enum {
00111         // * This widget is visible.  Use with {@link #setVisibility}.
00112         VISIBLE = 0x00000000,
00113 
00114         // * This widget is invisible, but it still takes up space
00115         // * for layout purposes.
00116         // * Use with {@link #setVisibility}.
00117         INVISIBLE = 0x00000004,
00118 
00119         // * This widget is invisible, and it doesn't take any space for layout
00120         // * purposes. Use with {@link #setVisibility}.
00121         GONE = 0x00000008
00122     };

01910 class WidgetTag {
01911     static const int32_t NO_ID = -1;
01912 
01913   private:
01914     int32_t mId;
01915     int32_t mItemType;
01916     int32_t mContainer;
01917     int32_t mScreen;
01918     int32_t mCellX;
01919     int32_t mCellY;
01920     int32_t mSpanX;
01921     int32_t mSpanY;
01922     bool mIsGesture;
01923 
01924   public:
01925     WidgetTag();
01926     virtual ~WidgetTag();
01927     explicit WidgetTag(WidgetTag* tag);
01928     void setId(int32_t id);
01929     void setItemType(int32_t itemType);
01930     void setContainer(int32_t container);
01931     void setscreen(int32_t screen);
01932     void setCellX(int32_t cellX);
01933     void setCellY(int32_t cellY);
01934     void setSpanX(int32_t spanX);
01935     void setSpanY(int32_t spanY);
01936     void setGesture(bool isGesture);
01937 
01938     int32_t getId();
01939     int32_t getItemType();
01940     int32_t getContainer();
01941     int32_t getScreen();
01942     int32_t getCellX();
01943     int32_t getCellY();
01944     int32_t getSpanX();
01945     int32_t getSpanY();
01946     bool getIsGesture();
01947 };
